ingredients: 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced and pickled in lime juice
Scotch bonnet crema (optional): 1/4 cup sour cream or Greek yogurt mixed with 1 tsp minced scotch bonnet and 1 Tbsp lime juice
steps: Divide rice and peas among serving bowls
Top with cooked protein, mango, pickled red onions, avocado, and cilantro
Serve with lime wedges and scotch bonnet crema if desired
title: Jerk Rice and Peas Bowl
